title: Game Modifiers
description: All game modifiers, their effects, systems, scripts, and metadata for Wildfrost.

modifiers.name: AimlessStartingItems
modifiers.title: Fog Bell
modifiers.script: Add Aimless To All Items(Setup: ScriptRunScriptsOnDeck)

modifiers.name: BlessingCharge
modifiers.title: Sun Bell of Charge
modifiers.description: Start each Battle with the <Redraw Bell> fully <Charged>

modifiers.name: BlessingCompanions
modifiers.title: Sun Bell of Fellowship
modifiers.script: Companion Limit + 1(Start: ScriptChangeCompanionLimit), Charm Limit + 1 To All Cards In Deck(Start: ScriptRunScriptsOnDeck)
